passage.text:
Patient's Name: LATTE, MONICA Referred by: SAVEM, CARL MD Date Taken: 02/07/2016 Date of Report: 02/07/2016
Clinical statement: Shortness of breath, wheezing, and bilateral lower extremity edema.
Technique: AP and lateral radiographs of the chest.
Comparison: July 18, 2010.
Findings:
Low lung volumes. There is mild interstitial edema. No focal consolidation, pleural effusion or pneumothorax is identified.
The cardiomediastinal silhouette is magnified by AP technique. Aortic calcifications are noted.
Mild anterior wedge compression deformities of two consecutive vertebral bodies at the thoracolumbar junction are unchanged. Left rotator cuff repair is noted.
Impression:
Mild interstitial edema.
Prepared By: SCHAER, JOHN MD Study interpreted and report approved by: SCHAER, JOHN MD Electronically signed Diagnostic Report Imaging Report 02/07/2016 07:17 PM - 02/07/2016 09:34 PM Exam Complete - Signed-Off
